title: january 29: black panther and remembering chadwick boseman (with Ricky Montgomery)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the premiere of Black Panther, and its star Chadwick Boseman’s untimely death. Then we hear from an amazing musical guest. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
